title: Collected Pixar Shorts (Vol 1) 720p iTunes
description:
Collected Pixar Shorts (Vol 1. + additional)
Larger collage of cover art: <a href=" http://i.imgur.com/RhfEU.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://i.imgur.com/RhfEU.jpg</a>

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V files for playback in iTunes
V: Up to 1280x720 (different for each film); all films are 23.98fps & h.264
A: 160 Kbps 2.0 AAC (all) 384 Kbps 5.1 AC-3 (most) / 64 Kbps 1.0 AAC (commentary)
S: None
C: None

SOURCE:
(Various) Retail Blu-rays

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes and Apple devices (iPad, iPhone 4, etc) that can handle HD video, including *all* versions -- 2007, 2010, 2012 -- of the AppleTV set top box.
